title: how do i get unchained alistar?
body: i subscribed to their youtube and didnt get the skin is there any way i can get it? my name is Phat Gromp

replies.body:
Hey man,

By the sounds of it they still haven't made this work on OCE yet, you'll have to [submit a support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/requests/new) to have the skin manually applied to your account.

See you on the rift.
